Electrical, Miscellaneous 08

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. Diagnosis

8. R&R center dash control panel assembly
9. R&R dash panel/support tube assembly

Notes:
1. Center dash panel control assembly consists of the HVAC control head, radio, switch packs etc..

A08-3271 CE BUS 0.9

WIRING OR SHORT, Diagnose and Repair

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts as needed to include:
2. Locate open or shorted circuit. Fabricate and/or replace wire terminal/connector

Notes:
1. Indicate on repair order: Wire number(s) and location(s) and/or connector numbers(s) and location(s)
2. All repairs over 2.0 hours require International approval

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
Minor (Repairs up to 0.3) A08-600 Models, ALL 0.3
Minor (Repairs over 0.3) A08-601 Models, ALL 0.5
Major (Repairs over 0.5) A08-602 Models, ALL 0.8
Major (Repairs over 0.8) A08-603 Models, ALL 1.2
Major (Repairs over 1.2) A08-604 Models, ALL 1.6
Major (Repairs over 1.6) A08-605 Models, ALL 2.0

WARRANTY OPERATIONS NOT COVERED IN THIS SECTION, T-Time

Notes:
1. This is not to be used to code diagnosis, testing or cleaning of operations already covered in this section. The time for those items is included in the operation. A written description or explanation must accompany each

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
T-TIME A08-T1 Models, ALL 0.0
T-TIME A08-T2 Models, ALL 0.0
T-TIME A08-T3 Models, ALL 0.0
